text: We're in the kind of place that feels like everyone shoul know your name. But they don’t. Families frequent this sp when they’ve fallen on hard times. It’s practically empty this boring Thursday. SERVERS drop off hot plates while ELDERLY PEOPLE sip cheap coffee at the counter. Our focus is directed toward a BLACK MAN and a BLACK WOMA sitting in a small booth in the back. The MAN: has a slender frame and a laid back demeanor. He not a fan of rocking the boat or ruffling feathers, but h ain’t no punk either. For the purpose of this story we’ll call him SLIM. The WOMAN: She’s regal as fuck. She’s not an easy laugh a she’s always waiting for the other shoe to drop. For the purposes of this story, we’ll call her QUEEN. Not unlike most first dates there are long silences and a of forced small talk. The WAITRESS quickly drops off their food and walks away without uttering a word. Queen examines the spread. Slim prays over his food. This is how he was raised. Quee sits awkwardly waiting for him to look up. As soon as he does --
Didn't you ask for scrambled eggs?
Yeah. She clocks the two sunny side up eggs on his plate.
It’s all good.
No, it’s not.
It’s just eggs.
I have a thing about that.
Eggs?  They have
No, about people not doing their job well.
She's got four kids and an alcoholic husband at home. She’s doing the best she can.
How do you know that?
She comes through my line every Sunday, yelling at her kids and giving me a stack of coupons. She can never find her Costco card so I always let her use mine so she can get the discount.
That’s nice of you.
Can I ask you something?
I don’t know, can you?
Easy, I know good grammar.
Do you?
We not in a classroom. a quick standoff.
You gonna ask me your question or not?
What took you so long to respond to me?
I didn’t realize that much time had passed.
I sent you a very well crafted message three weeks ago. I spell checked it and everything and got crickets. Then today, out of the blue, you hit me up asking if I wanna grab dinner. What changed?
I had a shitty day.
What was so shitty about it?
The state decided to execute my client. Queen says that as if she were giving him the logline to least favorite movie. In an instant Slim loses his appetite.
I didn’t know that was still legal here.
Yup. It’s legal in 31 states. And Ohio happens to be one of ‘em.
Was he innocent?
Even if he’s not - the state shouldn’t decide whether he lives or dies.
I’m sorry.
Me too. (then) Normally, I’d just go home and have a glass of wine by myself. But I didn’t feel like being alone. Not tonight. Slim can't tell if this is a cry for help or a propositio
You didn’t have any friends or family you could call? Slim sips his soda. Then --
No.
So you turned to Tinder?
Yeah.
Why'd you pick me?
I liked your picture.
(flattered) Word?
You had this sad look on your face. I felt sorry for you.
Damn.
I didn’t mean for that to sound shady.
Well it did.
My dad took that picture of me.
Why aren't you smiling? Slim shrugs. Not ready to divulge the reason just yet. They're still getting to know each other.
To be honest, I don’t have that many photos of myself.
Why not?
I know what I look like.
Pictures aren’t just about vanity. They're proof of your existence.

My family knows I exist. That’s enough. The idea of not having to prove oneself to the world is foreign to Queen. Slim stares at Queen’s plate. Most of her food is untouch Particularly her Caesar salad.
You gon eat that?
You can have some. He reaches over and stabs a few big pieces of lettuce wit his fork.
They always use just the right amount of dressing. Then --
Do you really like this place or is it the only spot you could afford?
It’s black owned. She wasn’t expecting that answer. Queen can appreciate th small token of righteousness.
Touché.

Slim drives a WHITE HONDA ACCORD. Yeah, he don’t give a f about cars. He tries to create a vibe by playing some neo soul music. Which is regular soul music with a hint of patchouli. He keeps looking down at his phone. Checking the directio
You shouldn’t text and drive.
Ain’t nobody texting. I’m making sure I don’t get lost. She grabs Slim’s phone from his lap.
I can tell you how to get to my hotel.
Give me my phone!
Relax. I’m gonna give it back.
You gon tell me where to turn?
Yeah. Queen points left.
Oh so now you gon point the directions?
I’m telling you where to go. Slim is visibly annoyed. Queen starts sifting through his phone.
You made a playlist? That’s cute. Slim tries to grab his phone back, unsuccessfully.
Don’t go through my phone!  She smiles.
Did you like “In a Sentimental Mood” before or after “Love Jones”?
I knew about that shit way before “Love Jones.”
Don’t lie.
Okay - I fucked with it more after I saw the movie.
I appreciate your honesty. Then --
So what happens tonight?
You’re gonna drop me off and you’1ll go home, I guess.
Oh.
Did you think we were gonna have sex? Slim is embarrassed.
No. I thought we were gonna hang out. Maybe get to know each other.

Nah, I’m good. Slim takes his phone back from Queen causing him to SWERV bit. Then he SWITCHES LANES without signaling. Just as he starts to pick up speed. He hears a horrifying sound. WOOP WOOP. Every black person’s worst nightmare.  8. We hear a robotic voice muffled through a loud speaker: “ over. That corner right there.” Slim’s heart starts to race. Queen’s heart beats at its u speed.
Do you have any warrants?
Really?
Do you?
Nah, I ain’t got no warrants.
Do you have any weapons in the car? Any narcotics?
I got a pocket knife in the glove compartment.
That’s fine.
I know it is.
The POLICE OFFICER steps out of his car and makes his way Slim’s door. He motions for Slim to roll down his window. He does.

Can you turn the radio down? Slim pauses for a beat. Then he does as he’s told. He’s always been good at being obedient. The Police Officer aims the light directly in Slim’s eyes Slim quickly shields his face so he can see what’s in fro of him.
Put your hand down. He does as he’s told.
He only had it up because you were shining a light in his eyes.
I’m trying to see inside the vehicle.
It’s just us.
License and registration. Slim reaches for his wallet.
I’m grabbing my wallet.
I can see that.
(under her breath) Well, y’all like to shoot first and ask questions later.
Do you have something you wanna say to me?

No, I don’t. Slim hands over his license. Slowly. As he reaches over t rummage through his glove compartment his hand accidental grazes Queen’s thigh. He’s not being fresh. Just nervous. finally finds his crumpled up registration and hands it o
Do you know why I pulled you over?
No, sir.
You forgot to use your signal back there. And you swerved a bit. Queen shakes her head.
Oh, my bad.  10.
Yeah, it is. The Police Officer takes Slim’s license and registration slowly walks back to his squad car. Queen sits there. Seething. Slim is calm as a cucumber.
I can’t believe this shit.
Just chill. She doesn’t like being told what to do.
Excuse me?
I told you to chill out.
I have a right to be angry.
I ain’t tryna die tonight. The weight of that statement leaps out of Slim’s soul and lands in Queen’s lap.

The Police Officer talks to his DISPATCHER. On his dashboard we see a PHOTO. It’s a picture of his WI and KIDS. The Kids are TWIN BOYS. They both have blonde hair and gr eyes. They’re completely unaware of how privileged their lives will be simply because they were born white and mal The Wife is a bored brunette whose dreams are no bigger t her backyard.
Whattya got?
Black male. Black female. Both late twenties. They’re in a white Honda. (MORE )
Driver changed lanes without signaling. He was driving erratically.
Is he under the influence?
I don’t know yet. I’11 make him do a breathalyzer.
Let me know if you need anything.
Will do.
The Officer is back at Slim’s window - leaning in a littl too close.
Will you step out of the vehicle, please?
(under her breath) Shit.
Can I ask why, Officer?

No, you can’t. Step out of the car. Before he gets out of the car Queen and Slim lock eyes. H doesn’t know Queen very well, but he can tell she has the spirit of Nat Turner wrestling inside of her. Slim steps out and puts his hands on the roof of the car. Police Officer proceeds to search him, aggressively.
You got any sharp objects in your pockets I should know about?
No, sir.
Any illegal substances?  12.
No, sir.
What about in the vehicle?
No, sir.
Queen’s left knee bounces uncontrollably. Her chest goes and down. Queen looks in the rearview mirror and sees the Police Officer interrogating Slim on the side of the road.
The Police Officer finishes patting Slim down.
Have you been drinking tonight?
No. Slim laughs.
Why is that funny?
Cause I don’t drink.
Do me a favor, pop the trunk.
Why?
Because I asked you to. Slim hesitates.  13.
Ain’t nothing in there but some shoe boxes.
Let’s see ‘em.
Okay. Queen HONKS the horn in an effort to get the Police Offic attention.
Can I help you?
Do you have a warrant?

Ma’‘am, he’s already agreed to the search. So I don’t need one. Slim pops the trunk. He was telling the truth. The only thing in his trunk are bunch of sneakers. Consumerism is his only vice. Slim feels vindicated and violated at the same time.
Told you.
Can we go now? The Officer’s cheeks turn bright red.
What’s in the boxes?
Shoes.
I’m gonna check just to be sure.
Fine. Then.

Can you please hurry up?  14. And just like that a SWITCH GOES OFF in the Police Office head. He feels disrespected. His uniform isn’t as intimidating as he thought it was. His super powers are imaginary. So he goes from 2018 to 1953 real quick. He PULLS OUT HIS GUN and AIMS IT AT SLIM.
Get on the ground and put your hands behind your back, now!
Are you serious?

Get on the ground! Slim does as he’s told. The Officer keeps the gun pointed at Slim’s head while looking at Slim’s car to make sure Queen stays inside. But after a beat she GETS OUT OF THE CAR to see what the is going on.
Why is he under arrest? The Officer turns around and AIMS HIS GUN AT HER. With on hand. The other hand stays planted on Slim’s shoulder.
Ma’am if you don’t get back in the car I’m gonna have to arrest you too.
I'm happy to get back in the car, but would you mind telling me why you're arresting him?
Get back in the vehicle now!
I’m reaching for my cell phone --
Keep your hands where I can see them! !
I have the right to record this arrest.  15. Queen REACHES in her pocket. Officer Reed AIMS HIS GUN AT HER and FIRES OFF TWO SHOTS.

The first shot misses her, but the SECOND SHOT GRAZES HER RIGHT THIGH. She collapses to the ground. And hits her he on the pavement. Slim SCREAMS for her. He tries to run toward her, but Off Reed grabs him by the shoulders and slams him on the grou Officer Reed and Slim roll around on the ground for a few seconds. Until Officer Reed finally pins Slim to the grou and points the gun at his face.

Don’t move! Officer Reed sees Queen trying to get up. He points his g at her again - while the Officer’s attention is diverted Slim KNOCKS the firearm out of his hand. When the gun goes flying - Officer Reed reaches for it, b Slim gets to it first. When Slim turns around he sees Officer Reed LUNGING towar him. Slim FIRES the gun! BOOM. HE SHOOTS OFFICER REED IN THE NECK. Killing him instantly Slim drops the gun and stops breathing. Queen muffles her scream. Officer Reed's lifeless body lies on the pavement. A pool blood quickly forms around him. Queen applies pressure to her fresh wound and winces in p Slim gets up and runs to her side. He sees the blood runn down her leg.
Oh shit! He tries to help her up, but she doesn’t want his assista
I got it. She slowly stands up. Gritting her teeth the entire time. Independence hurts.  16. Queen looks at the dead Police Officer.
Are you okay? Physically yes. Emotionally no.

Yeah. Slim puts Queen’s arm around his neck. He knows she’s struggling to stand on one good leg. She kneels down and grabs the gun. Then she gently shoves in his pants. It’s their gun now. Queen turns to face Officer Reed’s squad car. The headlig are still on. Giving the small CAMERA on the DASHBOARD a perfect view of her face.
Let's go. Slim looks at her for a long beat.
We can’t just leave him here.

Yes, we can. Now let’s go. Slim walks Queen back to the car. The engine is still purring. He helps her into the passenger seat. Slim walks around to the other side and gets in the drive seat. Still in shock. As they drive off into the darkness all we hear is the st filled radio coming from the squad car.
Officer Reed? Officer Reed, do you need back up? Officer Reed, do you copy? As we hear sirens far off in the distance, we --

Slim drives faster than his car is used to going. No musi playing. They’re no longer wrapping up a date. Now they’r fugitives, on the run. And one of them is wounded. Slim has no idea where they’re going. Neither does Queen. He’s just driving. Aimlessly. Slim grabs his phone.
I gotta call my dad. Queen snatches his phone and tosses it out the window. Sh chucks hers as well.
What the fuck are you doing?
We can’t call anybody. It’1ll make them accomplices.
You could've just said that shit. Now we ain’t got no phones.
A phone ain’t nothing but a tracking device anyway. Slim is shell shocked as Queen tries to take deep breaths
You're bleeding a lot.
It's okay it only grazed me. The severity of what they did starts to sink in.
Fuck! Why didn’t you just stay in the car?
So this is my fault?
You should've just let me handle it.  18.
If I didn’t get out the car you'd be dead right now. Slim looks at her wound. There’s a big gash.
We gotta get you to a hospital.
No! We can’t. Just keep driving.
Here -— Slim takes off his jacket while driving. She balls hell. She looks She grabs her teeth
Use my jacket as a bandage. it up and presses it against her leg. It hurts like
Fuck!
I have a small bottle of bourbon under the seat. at him with judgmental eyes.
I thought you didn’t drink.

I don’t. My cousin stole that from a hotel and left it in my car. it and pours some on her open wound. Queen grits and presses against it to stop the bleeding. Slim’s mind starts to race. He can’t sit still.
What if he was wearing a body cam? Or had a camera in his car. This shit bout to be all over the fucking news.
That's why we have to keep going.  19.
We can’t run forever.
I know that. But right now we have to run until we come up with a better plan.
Well, start throwing out some ideas.
Since when am I in charge of coming up with the ideas?
Since you made the decision to run.
We made that decision together.
I don’t remember that.
We ain’t turning ourselves in, I know that much.
If people watch the tape they’1l see what happened.
Yeah - they’1l see you shooting a police officer, you idiot!
Man, fuck this!
Slim pulls the car over. He gets out and just starts walk
What the fuck are you doing? Are you crazy? Queen limps out and hurries after him. Slim walks aimless up the road.
Where are you going?  20.
I‘mma find somebody with a phone so I can call my family.
If you do that they’1l know where we are.
Great.
What if they kill us? That stops Slim in his tracks. He turns to look at her.
Don’t say that.
There’s no guarantee they won’t. Then.
You’re a black man that killed a cop and then you took his gun.
We took it for protection.
Exactly.
I’m not a criminal.
You are now. Slim stares at her.
I just want to go home. I wanna see my family. Slim's eyes start to water. Queen grabs his hand.
If you turn yourself in - you’1l never see them again. And just like that. Something in Slim shifts. He feels powerless and small.  21.
All we can do is go forward. There’s nothing back there for us. Please. Let’s just keep going.
What about your family? You don’t care about leaving them behind?
No. I don’t.
We can’t just keep driving. We need to figure out what the fuck we gon do.
Alright, let’s go to my uncle’s house. We can stay there for a few days. Then we can figure out our next move.
Where does your Uncle live?
New Orleans.
That’s hours from here.
Then we should get going. They slowly walk back to the car. Hand in hand.
Al0 INT. SLIM'S CAR - MOMENTS LATER Al10 Slim blasts GOSPEL music. Queen stares out the window. Pissed.
Can you please turn that shit down?
It’s the only thing that calms me.
Well I can’t hear myself think.  10 22.
I don’t care. She turns it down.
Don’t touch my shit.
Pull over.
Why?
So I can get out.
You ain’t going nowhere. We in this together now. All she can do is fold her arms and roll her eyes - becau she knows he’s right.
Slim and Queen’s hearts are still racing. Then the car st to slow down.
Why you slowing down?
I’m outta gas. Then the car comes to a complete stop. They can no longer ride on fumes.
Why didn’t you say something?
What you mean why ain’t I say something? I had other shit on my mind. They sit there quietly for a beat. Then they see a flash light. Headlights to be exact.
Okay, we gotta flag this car down.  11 23.
I hope they black.
(to herself) That’s not always a good thing. They both step out of the car. Nervous as hell.
As the car gets closer and closer, Queen realizes -
Oh fuck. The driver’s wearing a cowboy hat.
Dammit. Slim crosses himself. Hoping for the best. The DRIVER is Mexican. His smile is friendly and his deme is warm.
Y'all having car trouble?
Uh, yeah, we ran out of gas. The Driver sees Queen’s leg is covered in blood.
Ma’‘am, are you okay?
Yeah, I accidentally cut myself. He looks at Slim and wonders if he’s stumbled upon a dome dispute.
Why don’t you guys hop in my truck? I’ve got a first aid kit in my backseat. And there’s a gas station up the road. I’1l give you a ride.
We don’t mind walking.  12 Al3 24.
Come on. I won’t bite.
They get in the truck. Slim immediately spots a SHERIFF'S BADGE sitting on the dash. While Queen climbs in the backseat.
Fuck.
What?
What?
Something wrong?
Uh no. I just didn’t know you were a sheriff. Queen looks up. Freaked out.
Oh yeah, I’m off duty today. He pulls off.

INT. SHERIFF'S TRUCK - MOMENTS LATER Al3 Queen tries to take deep breaths while she bandages herse up. The bleeding has finally stopped. She uses a lot of g and tape because she doesn’t know when she’1ll be able to bandage it. It looks a mess - cause she obviously doesn’t know what she’s doing. Slim sits up front, sweating bullets.
You know what. We can walk the rest of the way.  25.
Nah, I‘'1l let this be my good deed for the day.
Uh okay.
Y'all okay? You seem jumpy.
No, we're fine. We just made a wrong turn somewhere and got lost.
Where are we?
You're in Kentucky, my friend, but don’t worry - we’ll get you some gas and you'll be on your way. (then) How’s your leg?
Much better. Thank you.
The Sheriff looks at them for a beat. They stare back, confused.
Gas costs money.
Oh shit, I left all my stuff in the car.
Me too.
I can pay you back when we get to the car. The Sheriff takes pity on them and walks into the gas station.
The Sheriff grabs a red jug for the gas to go in and then walks up to THE CASHIER.
I need to fill this up.
That’1ll be ten bucks. The Sheriff hands him the money. Then he looks out the wi and sees Queen and Slim standing by his car. A VOICE from his walkie gives him an update.

A Police Officer was shot and killed by two assailants in Ohio. A male and a female. Both African- American. One of the suspects was wounded by the officer. They’re said to be armed and dangerous. Let’s just keep our eyes open. He stares daggers at Queen and Slim. They can feel his ey on them.
Queen has her hand on the passenger door. Slim paces back forth.
Stop pacing.
I can’t help it.
You look guilty.
I am guilty.
Have you been charged with something?
Then you’re not guilty.
Why is he staring at us like that?
I don’t know.
The Cashier hands the Sheriff a receipt.
Do you need anything else?
Hold on a second. He grabs his walkie and talks into it.
What kind of car were they in?
A white Honda.
Any other info?
We're still waiting for the dash cam footage to come in.
Get in the driver’s seat.
Are you crazy?

Just do it. Quick. Slim hops into the driver’s seat. Queen gets in the passe side. Before Slim can turn the key - BAM!  18 28. The Sheriff holds the red jug up to the driver side windo Startling them.
Were y’all gon leave without me? And before he can blink - Queen holds the dead police officer’s gun to his head.
Get in the car. The Sheriff does as he’s told. Without alarming anyone.
The Sheriff is driving while Queen holds a gun to the bac his head from the backseat. Slim is in the passenger seat wishing he could make himself disappear.

My name is Edgar. I’ve lived in Kentucky all my life. My wife died three years ago and now I’m raising our son by myself. I’m all he has in the world. Watching him grow up has been the greatest blessing of my life.
Don’t worry. I’m not gonna kill you. After a beat.
Did y’all kill that police officer?
It was self defense.
I’m sure it was. I have some colleagues that have gotten out of line more than once.
They're back at Slim’s car. Queen keeps the gun to his he The Sheriff keeps his hands where she can see them. Queen looks a the Sheriff's truck and then she looks at Slim’s Then --
Pop the trunk.
Why?
Just do it. Slim does as he’s told. Then she looks at The Sheriff.
Get inside, please. The Sheriff struggles to get inside Slim’s trunk. There’s lot of shoeboxes in there. He finally gets inside. Once he’s in the trunk Queen leans over him.

I don’t know what happened. But whatever it was, I’m sure you had good reason for doing what you did. Please. Let me help you. Queen just looks at him, with hurt and anger in her eyes SLAMS the trunk closed.
What’d you do that for? He wanted to help us.
He ain’t gon help us. Slim takes a deep breath trying to calm himself down.
It’s their job to make you feel like everything will be okay. But the second you confess you become property of the state. Is that what you want? You wanna be the state’s property?  20 30.
No. Queen gets in the driver's seat of the pick up truck and leans her head out the window.
You coming? Slim hops in the truck - and they’re off.
Queen is speeding down the highway.
Slow down.
I got it.
I'm just tryna keep us from getting pulled over again. Queen wants to run away so bad. That’s her pattern. But s can’t this time. She’s trapped.
I’m hungry.
Me too. He sees a few fast food spots up ahead.
Just stop at McDonalds or something.
That's disgusting.
Now ain’t the time to be choosy.

Queen spots a few BROWN BOYS failing miserably at skatebo tricks in the parking lot. She sits up in her seat and lo eyes with one of them. He has a lot of meat on his bones and a face covered in freckles. We'll call him CHUBBY. She WAVES him over. Slim clocks this and freaks out.
What you doing? The BOYS don’t even try to stop Chubby from walking over. They just keep busting their asses on the pavement.
You wanna get some free food and make a little money?
What’s the catch?
Ain't no catch, 1il man.
Aight. Queen hands him the last twenty dollar bill from her wall
Let me get a double cheeseburger and the ten piece chicken nuggets with sweet and sour sauce.
I'll have a chicken sandwich with no condiments and a small fry. You can keep the change.
Ain’t gon be much left after all that.
They're sitting on the bed of the truck - under the stars  32. Slim eats fast and loud. Queen eats like a rabbit. She watches him devour his food with a disgusted look on her face.
You make a lot of noise when you eat.
Woman, this could be my last meal - would you just let me be?
It’s hard for me to eat with you making so much noise. Slim tries to eat quieter. He fails, but Queen appreciate the gesture.
I’ve never heard of someone not being able to eat because they’re disgusted by the sounds of other people eating.
I know it’s weird, but I have a thing about it.
How do you avoid the sounds of people eating?
I eat alone most of the time.
That’s not surprising. She cuts her eyes at him. Slim stops eating for a second.
You scared?
No.
You're lying.
How do you know?  A beat. 33.
You answered too fast.
I thought if a person answered too fast it meant they were telling the truth.
My dad always told me if a person answers too quick it means they had the lie ready to go.
Wow. Well that’s good to know.
How do you know if your clients are telling the truth?
I don’t.
Then how can you defend them?
That’s my job.
But why do you do it?
I refuse to let certain states swap out a southern tree for an electric chair and call it justice.
Are you a good lawyer?
I’m an excellent lawyer.
Why do black people always feel the need to be excellent? Why can’t we just be ourselves?

We should go.  34. She hops down and gets in the passenger side. Slim wonder why she was so abrupt just then. Maybe he struck a nerve. He shakes it off and hops in the drivers seat. But before they can pull off he hears --
Hey, is this y’all? Chubby plays them a video on his phone. It’s the DASH CAM FOOTAGE of Slim shooting Officer Reed in the neck. The video has already been viewed by over a hundred thous people.
Nah, man. That ain’t us. Slim gets spooked and quickly starts the car. Chubby keep banging on the window.
Hold on, my dad wanna talk to y'all! As soon as he pulls forward he feels an IMPACT. He HIT something. Or someone.
Daddy!!! Slim gets out of the car. Queen stays inside. Slim spots a LARGE BLACK MAN laying on the ground. Slim g to touch him, but he flinches.
I’m so sorry. I didn’t see you.
You almost killed my daddy!
I think you hit my bad knee.
Can you move it? He tries to and then he SCREAMS in pain. Chubby starts crying.
You broke my daddy leg!  35.
Stop crying like a lil bitch. I’11 be alright.
Mommy told you to stop calling me a 1il bitch.
Nigga, I'll call you whatever the fuck I want. Queen hops out of the car to move this along.
We have to go now.
Y'all gotta take him to the hospital.
We can’t go to a hospital.
So I can get y’all food, but you can’t take my daddy to the hospital? Large Black Man moans in pain every time he tries to move leg.
Where’s the nearest hospital?
We don’t have time for this.
Would you calm down!
Don’t talk to me like that.
I’1l talk to you however I wanna talk to you.
Ya’'ll sound like me and my bitch.
Don’t call my mama a bitch!  23 36.
I ain’t talking bout yo mama. Slim tries to help the Large Black Man to his feet.
Come on, we’re gonna take you to a hospital. Slim, Queen, and Chubby all grab a limb and help him into back of the pick up truck.
Slim drives carefully as to not irritate the Large Black Man's injury. Chubby holds his dad’s hand the whole way.
I support what y’all are doing.
What do you mean?
Killing these crooked ass cops. We need to take all these muthafuckas out.
That’s not what we’re doing.
I saw the video, okay. If a cop shot at my bitch, I'd kill his ass too. Queen and Slim look at each other. Their hearts are racin
Cop killllaaaaassss!!!
Shut the fuck up, man!
Are y'all the new Black Panthers!? Is that what this is?
This is revenge.
For what?
For that nigga he kilt two years ago.
What?
Some dude was taking his daughter to school, minding his own business, and that cop killed him for no reason. Queen remembers the case. Slim cuts his eyes at her.
Did you know about this?
Of course not. He doesn’t know what to believe. Then --
The hospital’s on the left, pull over!
Slim swerves into the driveway.
Alright. We’re here.
Y'all gon help me with him or nah?

Slim and Queen are spent. An OLDER BLACK MAN chews tobacc and blinks at them.
Your transmission’s fucked.
That don’t sound good.
I can have it back to you tomorrow for about two grand.
Two grand?
We need it back today.
Y'all in a rush? He looks at them suspiciously.
Yeah, we’re on our way to visit family.
Why y’all in a rush to do that? He lets out a hearty laugh and then spits tobacco juice i cup.
I can try to get it back to you tonight but that'll cost you a little mo.
How much mo?  74.
Another five hundred. Slim pulls Queen to the side.
That’s all of our money.
Then fuck it - let’s just hop on a bus or something.
That's too risky.
You wanna give him all our money?
We need to get the car fixed. Then --
Yo, we doing this or not? Queen walks over and hands him the envelope full of cash.
Here. This is all we have.
We just need the car fixed as soon as possible.
I’ll move as fast as I can. Slim looks up and sees the mechanic’s office. He clocks a ROTARY PHONE sitting on his desk.
Can I use your bathroom?
Yeah, it’s right through there. Queen sits on a bench. Arms folded. Looking at the clock.

53 54 75. INT. OLDER BLACK MAN’S OFFICE - CONTINUOUS - DAY 4 53 Slim sits in the bathroom holding the rotary phone on his lap. He takes a deep breath. Then he dials. Slowly. We hear the phone ring. MAN’S VOICE Hello.
Dad? MAN’S VOICE Are you okay, boy?
Yeah, I’m fine. MAN’S VOICE This ain’t like you.
I know. Then --
I just wanted you to know I’m okay. And that I love you. MAN’S VOICE I love you too, son.
We're tryna get to -- His father hangs up. Slim looks at the phone. Wondering w happened.
We see a POLICE OFFICER was listening to their conversati SLIM'S MOTHER, a dignified woman who never leaves the hou without makeup on, sits next to her husband - defiantly.
Why the fuck would you do that?! The Police Officer snatches the phone from Slim’s Father.  76.
Get outta my house.
You're under arrest for helping a fugitive.
Do what you gotta do.
We're going to find them.
Not with my help.
The Older Black Man fixes the transmission while Slim and Queen wait impatiently.
Y'all are making me nervous. Why don’t y’all go take a walk or something?
We're not leaving you alone with this car.
Ain’t nobody tryna steal your car.
Well I just wanna make sure.
You got bigger problems than me.
So you know who we are?
I’m old not blind.
Then why ain’t you give us a discount?  77.
Cause unlike the rest of these simple ass niggas I don’t approve of what y’all did.
We didn’t do it on purpose.
It don’t matter if it was on purpose or not. You gave them a license to kill us.
That cop shot at me.
You gave ‘em an excuse.
You weren’t there.
No, I wasn’t. But if I was I would’ve taken the ticket and been on my way.
Can you work more and talk less?
I could work faster if y’all left me the fuck alone.
I’m not leaving this car.
What if I gave you some insurance?

I don’t want no house keys or no drivers license cause all that can be replaced. The Older mechanic walks to the garage door and knocks on After a beat a SKINNY BROWN KID no more than seventeen li it up. The young man looks like Barack Obama long before fell in love with Michelle. He wears a dirty T-shirt and skinny jeans.
Yes, sir?  56 78.
You wanna take these nice folks on a walk? One look at Queen and Slim and he lights up like a Christ tree. He obviously doesn’t share his father’s views about them.
Yeah! Then -
Yes, sir.
I need some time to fix their car. Keep ‘em occupied until then.
Yes, sir. Slim walks over and shakes the young man’s hand.
I'm -
I know who you are. It’s an honor to meet you.
What’s your name?
Everybody calls me Junior. His father beams with pride. Then Junior takes Queen’s hand and kisses it, sweetly.
Queen and Slim walk hand in hand. Junior leads the way.
Where is everybody?
There’s nothing to do around here. People just go to work and go home.  79.
I know the feeling.

I can’t believe y’all are here. I was just watching you on TV and now you're right here next to me. Shit is crazy. Slim remembers what it was like to be Junior's age. When weight of the world wasn’t on his shoulders and everythin was exciting.
I hope y’all make it. Without knowing it Junior reminds them their days could b numbered - and every breath should be cherished.
Me too.
Even if y’all don’t it’1ll be okay.
How so?
Cause then you’1ll be immortal. Slim walks quietly - digesting the thought.
I like that. Queen takes a deep breath. Drinking in her simple surroundings. Appreciating the quiet. For once. Then --

I'd rather live. They finally arrive at Junior's secret spot. It’s a small hill with a perfect view of the sunset. Queen, Slim, and Junior sit on the grass and marvel at th sun as it prepares to say goodnight. Queen looks at the purple and orange sky - then she looks Slim. He’s so serene. He’s made peace with whatever the outcome will be. Junior looks up to him. Literally and figuratively. And for the first time in her life - she sees God.  57 58 80.
Queen and Slim get back in their newly repaired Cadillac. turns on the car and it hums like it just came off the factory line.
Yo, Junior. Can you take our picture?
Yeah.
I don’t think that’s a good idea.

Come on, I want proof we were here. This is proof Slim remembers everything. She likes that h using her own logic against her. She gives in. And they both look at Junior - ready to be captured. Queen has her hand on the wheel. Her toned arm on full display. Slim leans forward. He doesn’t look at the camer he looks at her as if she were his bride to be. Queen stares directly into the lens, the look in her eyes the perfect combination of fear and pride. We linger on them long enough to realize they’re no longe the people we met at the diner.

Queen is driving. Deep in thought. Slim is fast asleep. They drive by a sign that reads WELCOME TO GEORGIA. Queen stares at it for a long beat. It brings back an unwanted memory. She makes an impulsive turn. Jolting Slim awake.  59 81.
Yo. She’s on a mission.
Do you mind if we make a detour?
I do actually. Queen doesn’t care and makes a hard left turn. She drives down a winding road. Tears in her eyes.
You okay?

Not really. He sits up and wipes the sleep out of his eyes. Slim can tell she needs to be held in this moment, but he doesn’t know if that’s permitted. He reaches out and touc the small of her back. She allows it. His hand is bigger than she realized. He rubs her back so at first - then he applies more pressure to help her rela and to make sure she feels his presence in a way she hasn before. Her heart is beating so fast he can feel her body pulse. heartbeat syncs up with hers. They are connected.
Queen stares at a tombstone. ETTA JOHNSON - BELOVED MOTHER AND DAUGHTER. Slim stands a few feet behind her. Far enough to give her space. But close enough to let her know she’s not alone.

We were close when I was younger, but when I got older I felt like I didn’t know her anymore. She didn’t know me either. We could go months without talking. And when we did - I hated it. I had nothing to say to her. (MORE )
She wanted a connection so badly, but I just didn’t care. I didn’t need her anymore. She turns to look at Slim. Searching for judgement in his eyes. There is none.
I used to call her the great pretender.
Why?

She was really good at acting like everything was okay. Queen extends her hand to Slim. He takes it and moves in closer. She kneels down and pulls up a few weeds crowding her mother’s resting place - all the while still holding onto Slim’s hand. Queen kisses her palm and touches the cold tombstone. This is what closure looks like. She lets go of Slim’s hand and makes her way back to the Slim hangs back. He stares at her mother’s grave a little longer.
Queen and Slim sit in a parked car. Slim is in the driver seat. Queen is in the passenger seat.
My grandma left the house to both of them. My mom wanted to sell it. My uncle wanted to live in it. Typical family bullshit.
Yeah.
One night they were at the house fighting, he was really fucked up, and he pushed her down a flight of stairs. She cracked her skull. (MORE )
She bled out so quick that by the time the ambulance got there she was already dead. Slim hangs his head. Unsure of what to say.
I had just passed the bar. I was excited to try my first case. I never thought that would be it.
How could you defend the person that killed your own mother?
I knew it was an accident.
Does it ever piss you off that he’s alive and she isn’t?
All the time. Queen turns on the RADIO. We hear a journalist ON THE RAD reporting on a NATIONWIDE PEACEFUL RALLY in progress.

People are in support of the two fugitives accused of killing a police officer in cold blood. Slim and Queen aren’t really listening to the radio. It’s just background noise to them. Then Slim takes Queen’s face in his reliable hands and ki her. It’s so pure and innocent - it’s unclear if sex will follow. But then he pulls her in close and kisses her again. The second kiss is anything, but innocent. It’s the perfect combination of lust and melancholy. Slim pulls Queen on t of him. Rather than entering her right away - he lifts he to his face - her hands press up against the ceiling whil DEVOURS her.

We're following Junior walking down the street with purpo  62 63 64 84. We watch as he walks up on a protest. The same one the journalist spoke of on the radio. He joins - A SEA OF BLACK and BROWN BODIES are MARCHING i PROTEST. They are full of PRIDE and VENOM. They hold up signs in support of Queen and Slim. They cha and walk proudly. The PROTESTORS are surrounded by POLICE OFFICERS. The Officers are dressed in SWAT GEAR. Ready for war. The Officers form a line. The Protestors form a line oppo them. The Police stand completely still like statues of oppress in the South. The Protestors are vibrant not violent.
Slim pulls Queen’s hair back and bites her neck. He follo each bite with a kiss. Queen reclines the drivers seat as far back as it will go kisses Slim deeply. As they continue to have sex, we --

head_text.subj: A POLICE OFFICER THROWS TEAR GAS INTO THE CROWD.

text: Protesters cover their faces with t-shirts and hoodies. Some Protestors run for their lives while others run towa the Police. The Police Officers start BEATING protestors with BATONS chase after them while on HORSEBACK.
Queen is now gripping onto the steering wheel. Hands and sweating. Slim grips her waist and pulls her back and for  65 85. Windows fogged. Both gasping for air.

Junior stands in front of the crowd. He looks like a youn Eldridge Cleaver. A BLACK POLICE OFFICER stops him from going any further. Officer is dressed in bullet proof gear from head to toe. Junior is only wearing a hoodie and sweatpants to protect him. It’s David and Goliath all over again.
If you don’t vacate the premises I’m gonna have to arrest you, son.
I’m not your son.
What’s your name, young man?
I don’t have to tell you that.
I don’t want to hurt you. Trust me. But it’s my job to clear the streets. Which means you can’t be here.
I have a right to protest.
I understand that, but you don’t have a permit. So that means you're breaking the law.
What you gon do, kill me?
No, but I will arrest you. The Police Officer LIFTS UP THE BULLETPROOF SHIELD ON HIS HELMET - so there’s one less barrier between them.

I’m begging you. Go home.  66 67 68 69 70 86. The Police Officer GRABS Junior by his arms -- in an atte to calm him down. But he wrestles free. Junior pulls out a SMALL HAND GUN. He aims it at the only part of the Officer’s body that’s not covered. He SHOOTS him in the face. Causing the Officer’s head to EXPLODE IN HIS HELMET.
Slim thrusts his pelvis against Queen’s again and again u she finally throws her head back and SCREAMS with pleasur

Junior watches the Police Officer fall to the ground in f of him. He has succeeded in killing a giant that meant hi harm, but he feels justified just the same. A SEA of SWAT MEMBERS descend on Junior and tackle him to ground. His future is uncertain.
Queen and Slim lay intertwined in the backseat. Naked. Spent. Sweaty. Completely unaware the world is burning around them.
They drive along a winding road. They’re quiet and serene Slim reaches for Queen’s hand while she drives. She takes hand and doesn’t let it go.

Slim rings the doorbell of a very middle class home. The grass is pristine. The windows are sparkling. An American flag blows in the wind.  87. It's safe to assume a soldier that came home with a purpl heart on his chest and a wounded heart behind it - lives here. The door opens. JOHNNY SHEPHERD is standing there. He is soldier. And he has the scars to prove it.
We've been expecting you. Before they walk in Slim notices a NOSEY NEIGHBOR peeking the window.

THE SHEPHERDS sit on a couch across from Queen and Slim. MRS. SHEPHERD is a college educated with views more conservative than she’d like to admit. Mr. Shepherd has just given them a devastating update.
What do you mean they killed him?
He shot a police officer in the face. Slim is shaken to his core.
We were just with him.
You knew the boy?
We spent some time with him.
Did you order him to do it? Slim stands up. He wants to strangle her.
Are you crazy? Queen grabs his arm and tries to calm him down.  88.
We would never do that.
These kids think it’s okay to kill cops because of you.
Who made cops think it was okay to kill us?
We didn’t want this.
(to her husband) There’s a war going on out there and you've welcomed it into our home.
They didn’t start it. She cuts her eyes at his husband.
I want them gone by morning.
We can leave right now. Slim stands up.
Let's go. This time Queen does as she’s told. The roles have revers As they start for the door.
Don’t let your pride get you killed.
I ain’t staying here.
I got secret hiding spots all over this place. Even if the cops come here - they won't be able to find you. He thinks for a beat.  72 89.
Thank you. Then --
Y’all hungry?
Starving.

The four sit at an old dining room table. This is the mos unusual double date we’ve ever seen. But the room is peaceful. The spread is something straigh out of the 1950s. A protein. A veggie. And mashed potatoe The only beverage available to drink is milk. Whole milk.
There’s a bounty on your heads.
How much are we worth?
Two fifty.
Total?
Each.
That ain’t much.
That could pay off our mortgage.
You gon turn us in?
No. Queen cuts her eyes at Mrs. Shepherd.
Earl told me you needed a plane.  90.
Yeah.
I know a guy. I already gave hima call. Mr. Shepherd gets up from the table and grabs a notepad. WRITES DOWN AN ADDRESS and hands it to Queen.
Tell him I sent you. Queen slips it in her pocket.
We should eat before it gets cold. Everyone grabs hands and bows their heads.
I‘1l lead us in a prayer.
May I do it?
Of course. Queen takes a deep breath. She’s never done this before.

I'd like to start by thanking God for the breath in my lungs. And the breath in the lungs of everyone at this table. I’m grateful we have a place to sleep tonight and food to put in our bellies. Thank you for bringing us this far. Thank you for this journey. No matter how it ends.
Amen.

Amen. Amen. Everyone starts to eat. Queen looks up at Slim and notice for the first time he’s not shoveling food into his mouth He’s not chewing like a cow. He’s taking his time and savoring every bite. This is a change he isn’t aware of, she is. Queen stares at him for a long beat and smiles.  73 91. Then AN AGGRESSIVE VOICE COMING FROM OUTSIDE interrupts t peaceful dinner.
The house is surrounded. Come out with your hands up. Mrs. Shepherd looks like she’s about to piss herself. Mr. Shepherd is no stranger to this type of situation. He is and collected.
Okay, I want you two to run upstairs and go into the yellow bedroom on the left. Hide under the bed.
They'll find us there.
There are loose panels under the bed. Hide under there and don’t make a sound.
Okay.

Go. Now! Queen and Slim run upstairs in search of the yellow bedro While Mr. Shepherd quickly gets rid of Queen and Slim’s plates to make it look like there were only two people breaking bread instead of four.
You have three seconds to come out or we're coming in! Mr. Shepherd grabs his wife’s trembling hand and walks he the front door.
Mr. & Mrs. Shepherd walk outside slowly with their hands raised. The SWAT LEADER immediately starts searching them both. M Shepherd dissolves into tears. Mr. Shepherd is stoic.  74 75 92.
Do you have a warrant?! He holds one up.
I want to read that.
Take all the time you need. Mr. Shepherd reads the warrant carefully. It’s legit. He nods at the police. Then with the flick of a finger th Swat Leader commands his team to enter the house.
They swarm the house like bees. Tearing it apart. They break antiques and damage the wood floors.

Queen and Slim make their way to the MASTER BEDROOM. They to lift up the panels under the bed. Some of them lift ea while others are stuck and won’t budge. Slim starts to sw bullets. Queen does her best to loosen them up as fast as can. They move quickly - but they aren’t fast enough. Determined FOOTSTEPS make their way into the bedroom. The bedroom door SWINGS OPEN. Silence. We follow the FEET looking in the closet and then out the window to see if they jumped. Then we PAN UP to reveal the feet belong to the Swat Lead that shoved a warrant in Mr. Shepherd's face. He stares at the bed and grins. Then he lifts it up with quick swoop, and -- Nothing. They aren’t there.
Fuck! He lets go of the bed and it CRASHES against the floor.  76 77 78 93.
Queen and Slim lay close together. Shaking. Trying not to breathe.

The Police are loading the bright red Cadillac that Queen Slim have called home - for most of their journey - onto tow truck. It’s evidence now. The Shepherds are handcuffed and sitti in the back seat of a Swat Truck. The Swat Leader from be looks down at them.
If you tell me where they’re going we can let you go and you can enjoy the rest of your evening. Mrs. Shepherd looks at her husband.
We don’t know where they’re going. He kneels down and gets in Mrs. Shepherd’s face.
How bout you? You look a lot smarter than your husband. As we linger on her face, we --
Queen and Slim are half asleep. She turns to him.
We have to leave at some point.
I’m not tryna walk into an ambush.
I heard cars leave hours ago.
I’m sure they left some folks behind to keep an eye on the house.  79
You can stay and die of starvation if you want to - but I’m getting the fuck outta here. Queen lifts the panels up one by one. They both take in t fresh air. They roll from up under the bed.

Queen walks over to the window that faces the back of the house. All that’s back there is a GARAGE and a small backyard. Queen lifts up the window and looks down. It’s low enough so they can’t kill themselves, but high enough that they could break a leg if they landed wrong.
We gotta jump. Slim looks out.
It’s too high.
All you have to do is bend your knees as soon as you hit the ground. Bend and roll.

This ain’t no damn fire drill. Queen climbs onto the window seal, takes a deep breath, a JUMPS out of the window. But she doesn’t take her own adv and forgets to bend her knees. She hits the ground HARD and lands flat on her back knock the wind out of her body and her LEFT SHOULDER OUT OF ITS SOCKET. Queen grabs her arm and rocks back and forth tryi not to scream. She’s in excruciating pain.

Fuck! Seeing Queen in pain is the push he needed. He walks back few feet and runs toward the window LEAPING to the ground follows Queen’s instructions and lands perfectly. Rather than rejoicing he rushes over to Queen’s aid and p her into the garage.  80 81 95.
Queen is in so much pain she can’t speak.
Okay, I know how to do this. But you have to promise not to scream. Can you do that? She shakes her head no.
I believe in you. She continues to shake her head and backs away from him.
I think there are cops out front and if they hear you - it’s over. We’re done. I know how strong you are. Those words give her the strength she needs.
Give me your shirt. He takes it off and balls it up. She stuffs it in her mou and gives him a nod to let him know she’s ready. Slim grabs her elbow with one hand and grasps her neck wi the other.
Then YANK! She SCREAMS but it’s muffled by his shirt.

Two POLICE OFFICERS are standing guard out front. Police Officer 1, is out of shape and always in a good mood. Pol Officer 2, is too intense for his own good. Police Officer 1 hears Queen’s muffled groans.
Did you hear that?
Hear what?  82
It sounds like somebody’s crying.
No, it’s just nature. You city boys ain’t used to that shit.
Don’t refer to me as a boy.
You know what I meant.
Look, I know the difference between a person and an animal.
Then go walk around.
Man, watch how you talk to me.
Touchy touchy. Police Officer 1 starts to walk around the property.
Queen rubs her shoulder - still in pain. While Slim searc for a key to the STATION WAGON parked in the garage.
Help me find a screwdriver. They both start searching.
You know how to jumpstart a car?
I used to. My older brother taught me one summer.
I didn’t know you had a brother.
Yup.  83 84 97. They lock eyes for a second - realizing there’s so much a each other they may never know. Then Queen finds an old toolbox. Slim digs through it.
The only car we ever jump started was my dad’s. He used to take his keys with him everywhere he went. He knew better than to leave that Acura around us.

I see why. Slim finally finds what he’s looking for and hops in the driver's seat. Queen gets in the passenger. This is a far from Uncle Earl’s fly caddy. But they’1l take what they c get. Slim tries to convince the ignition the screwdriver is a but it doesn’t work.
Dammit. He takes it out and tries again. Nothing.
Police Officer 1 walks around, looking to see if anyone’s there. He sees the garage. But doesn’t hear anything. He cocks his gun, and walks over to the garage.
Queen digs through the toolbox again and finds a smaller screwdriver and gives him that. Slim puts that in the ignition and it works. The engine i louder than they thought it would be.

Now how we supposed to get outta here? Before she can answer.  85 86 98. POLICE OFFICER 1 LIFTS UP THE GARAGE DOOR. They turn to look at him. They’re caught. The Police Officer looks around and realizes his colleagu are out front - chatting with each other. He looks back a Queen and Slim and sees two faces that remind him of his He remembers why he became a cop. To help people. And at moment, no one needs his help more than the two people in front of him. They have a staring contest for about three seconds. Then he takes a few steps back and gives them room to bac up. Slim puts the car in reverse and moves the car back slowl Queen sinks low into her seat. Police Officer 1 nods his head as a way to say, “go head” They pull off and drive onto a SECLUDED side street. And just like that they’re on the road again. Police Officer 1 watches them go. Confident in his decisi He walks back around to the front of the house.
What was it?
A couple deer got caught in some branches. I set ‘em free.
Told you. As Police Officer 1 grins, we --
They’re almost in Miami.  99. Queen sticks her head out the window and lets the wind hi her face. For the first time in her life she feels comple free. No fear.
What you doing? She doesn’t respond. Queen unbuckles her seatbelt and hoi herself up onto the window sill and leans on the roof of car.
Are you crazy?! Get back in the car! She looks up at the sky. The stars seem bigger to her. Qu takes a deep breath - then gets back in her seat.
Are you tryna get caught?
No, I just always wanted to do that.
Well, don’t do it while I’m driving.
You should try it.
Nah, I’m good.
Pull over.
No. She grabs the steering wheel and YANKS it to the left. Th almost crash into another car.
If I do it will you please let me drive the rest of the way in peace?
Swear to God.
Swear on something you believe in.  87 88 100.
Okay fine, I’1l swear on you. And just like that a wave of freedom washes over Slim. She kisses him. As he pulls over, we --

Queen gripping the steering wheel while Slim tries to hoi himself up and out of the car window. He’s not as gracefu she is. He finally gets up there and tries to hold onto the roof the car, but his hands are sweaty so he loses his grip an FALLS BACK - with his arms flailing in the air.
Oh shit! Before he flies out of the car he grabs a hold of the rearview mirror and regains his balance.
Fuck this, I’m coming back in.

No, you got it. You’re good. I’1l drive slow. She slows down a bit and Slim finally gets a firm hold of roof. Queen picks up a little speed and Slim gets a whiff of th freedom she just got. Slim doesn’t know if he’1l ever fee this free again - so he cherishes the moment.
Queen and Slim are parked in an empty field - somewhere i Miami. It looks like an abandoned plantation.
Are you sure this is the address?  101. Slim gets out of the car and looks around. There’s no sig human life anywhere.
Will you please just get back in the car before you get shot.
Ain’t nobody out here. Slim gets back in the car. They’re both exhausted from driving all day.
I was hoping we'd pull up toa house so we could get some sleep.
Well, there isn’t one.
I can see that.
They're gonna find us.
No they’re not. Queen shakes her head.

How about you get in the back and get some sleep and I’1l sit up here and make sure nobody kills us. She gets out of the car and climbs in the back. The backseat is practically a bed anyway. Slim takes off jacket and places it behind her head from the front seat. Queen curls up in a ball and closes her eyes. Slim stares into the night. While he looks up at the stars, he hears
I can’t sleep.
You want me to turn on the radio?
No. I want you to tell me a story. He turns to look at her. Confused and annoyed.
What kind of story?
Any story. I don’t care. He fidgets with his hands as he begins to speak.

When I was little I asked my mom where babies come from. She said I was too young to know. So I went asked my dad. He said babies are the product of two people that needed something from each other. I didn’t know what that meant. So I said -- needed what? He said maybe they needed to feel seen. Maybe they needed to feel loved. Maybe they needed to feel human.
And then what?
Then I asked my grandmother and she said -- babies come from God. They're His way of making sure no one ever really dies. I remember her saying “through our children we are reborn.” Queen smiles.
Then I went to my older brother and asked him and he said, nobody knows. You're just born. That’s it. Now leave me alone. Slim chuckles at the memory.
I wasn’t satisfied with that answer either, but I’d run out of family members to ask - so he got the last word.
So whose right? 102. Tears well up in Slim’s eyes. He wonders if he’ll ever se them again.  89 103.

None of ‘em. Babies come from fucking. Plain and simple. They both chuckle. Then Queen’s eyelids become heavy. She eventually closes eyes and falls asleep. Slim stares at her. Grinning. Watching her sleep has quic become one of his favorite pastimes. After a moment he fi it hard to keep his eyes open as well. Soon - they’re both fast asleep. In a station wagon. In t middle of a field. Somewhere in Florida.

Slim is in a deep sleep. Mouth open. Head tilted. Then we hear - CLICK CLACK. Slim JOLTS awake. There's a RIFLE aimed at Slim’s face. Once his brain comp what’s happening he scoots over into the drivers seat - t causes Queen to wake up too.

What’s going on? She looks at the man holding the rifle. He’s a BLACK MAN a scruffy BEARD and inquisitive eyes. He’s wearing an oversized white t-shirt and his teeth are covered in 14 karat GOLD grillz. Queen and Slim aren’t sure if they should feel anxious or ease.
Why y’all acting all scared and shit?
Cause you pointing a gun at my face? He joyfully swings it over his shoulder.
Oh I’m just fucking wit you, playa.  104. He opens the door on the driver’s side. Slim gets out, cautiously.
You know the Shepherds?
Hell yeah.
They were supposed to call you.
Y'all the ones that killed the cop, right? Slim doesn’t want to confess to this.
I got you. Follow me. He walks pretty fast. Queen and Slim trail behind him. Th
How do you know the Shepherds?
From way back.
How long?
Man, I don’t know - why you giving me the third degree. I’m just tryna help you. Queen and Slim try to keep up with him.
They said you had a plane.
They lied about that. Slim stops his tracks. Queen and the Thin Black Guy stop
If you don’t have a plane we not going with you.
Look man, I ain’t got that kind of money. But I got a friend that do. (MORE )
He a baller. He can get whatever you want. When we get to my trailer Imma call him.
Why can’t you call him right now?
